info.title: ITA Landing page API documentation
info.description:
Documentation needed for the API Rest for the landing page to IT Academy.
 *   This API supports Catalan, Spanish and English languages using the 'Accept-Language' header. Defaults Catalan.
 *   Also it is possible to add FAQs in a different language to the current one by using the language parameter.
 *     Some useful links below:
 * [ITA Landing Backend](https://github.com/IT-Academy-BCN/ita-landing-backend)
 * [ITA Landing Frontend](https://github.com/IT-Academy-BCN/ita-landing-frontend)

get.description: This endpoint is used to take a list of all the apps

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new application.

get.description: This endpoint is used to get the details of a specific application.

put.description: This endpoint is used to update the details of an existing application.

delete.description: This endpoint is used to remove an existing application.

200.description: Success message indicating that the application has been removed.

post.description: This endpoint is used for a user to log into the app and get an access token.

200.description: Access token for the user. The response message may vary based on user's language settings.

post.description: Sends a generated code to the specified email address.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to send the code to.

get.description: This endpoint is used to get persons that work on the specific project

get.summary: Get list of frequently asked questions (FAQs)
get.description: This endpoint is used to get a list of all frequently asked questions.

get.summary: Get details of a specific Frequently Asked Question (FAQ) with all its available translations
get.description:
This endpoint is used to get the details of a specific FAQ and its available translations.
 *     For translations in a specific language, use the /faqs/{id}?language endpoint.

put.summary: Update an existing Frequently Asked Question (FAQ)
put.description: This endpoint is used to update the details of an existing FAQ.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., ca, es, en). The language of the aplication

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., ca, es, en). The language in the FAQ is going to be saved.

title.example: Títol de la meva pregunta freqüent

description.example: Descripció de la meva pregunta freqüent

delete.description:
This endpoint is used to delete an existing FAQ or its translation.
 *     If the language parameter is not provided the whole FAQ will be deleted

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., ca, es, en). The language of the aplication

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., ca, es, en). The language of the FAQ translation that will be deleted.

200.description: Success message indicating that the FAQ or a FAQ translation has been removed.

get.summary: Get details of a specific Frequently Asked Question (FAQ) in a specific language
get.description:
This endpoint is used to get the details of a specific FAQ in a specific language.
 *     To get a response with all the available translations use the /faqs/{id} endpoint.

200.description: FAQ details in the specified language.

post.summary: Create a new Frequently Asked Question (FAQ) in a specific language
post.description:
This endpoint is used to create a new FAQ in Catalan, Spanish or English.
 *     To save a new translation of an existentent FAQ please use the Update endpoint.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., ca, es, en). The language of the aplication

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., ca, es, en). The language in the FAQ is going to be saved.

title.example: Títol de la meva pregunta freqüent

description.example: Descripció de la meva pregunta freqüent

422.description: Translation code key not available or validation fail.

items.example: The title has already been taken.

post.description: This endpoint is used to register a new user in the application.
This endpoint is used send an email to a register user to reset the password.
This endpoint is used to update the password of the user.

example.title: Títol de la meva pregunta freqüent
example.description: Descripció de la meva pregunta freqüent

example.title: Title of my frequently asked question
example.description: Description of my frequently asked question

title.example: Títol de la meva pregunta freqüent

description.example: Descripció de la meva pregunta freqüent

example.title: Títol de la meva pregunta freqüent
example.description: Descripció de la meva pregunta freqüent

bearer.description: Enter token in format (Bearer <token>), it means: Bearer + space + token
bearer.name: Authorization
